name: add_faction
description: A faction or organization operating within the game world.

name.description: The name of the faction or organization.

type.description: The type of the faction.(e.g., Government, Guild, Cult, Criminal, Resistance, Corporation, Clan).

description.description: A detailed description of the faction.

goals.description: The main objectives or goals of the faction.

resources.description: Important assets, holdings, or resources (ships, tech, wealth, territory).

alliances.description: Other factions or entities allied with this faction.

relationship.description: Allied or friendly to these other groups.
In rivalry or open antagonism with these factions.

agendaPriority.description: Ordered priorities/agendas for the faction at this time.
